Name: Elevator VR
About the game: You have boarded the elevator. The elevator is in motion. The elevator travels the designated route. The elevator is not sentient. The elevator is an analogue machine. The elevator has cables and pulleys. The pulleys control its speed and direction. The elevator button suggests what the elevator should do next. The elevator does what it wants next. It is the elevator. Take a meditative elevator journey as you travel between the floors.
